sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbatchresult ( batch_result_id , batch_schdul_id , batch_opert_id , paramtr , sttus , error_info , execut_begin_tm , execut_end_tm , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id ) VALUES ( #batchResultId# , #batchSchdulId# , #batchOpertId# , #paramtr# , #sttus# , #errorInfo# , #executBeginTm# , #executEndTm# , SYSDATE , #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbatchresult SET batch_result_id = #batchResultId# , batch_schdul_id = #batchSchdulId# , batch_opert_id = #batchOpertId# , paramtr = #paramtr# , sttus = #sttus# , error_info = #errorInfo# , execut_begin_tm = #executBeginTm# , execut_end_tm = #executEndTm# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND batch_result_id = #batchResultId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbatchresult WHERE 1 = 1 AND batch_result_id = #batchResultId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT batch_result_id , batch_schdul_id , batch_opert_id , paramtr , sttus , error_info , execut_begin_tm , execut_end_tm , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id FROM COMTNBATCHRESULT WHERE batch_result_id = #batchResultId#

SELECT A.BATCH_RESULT_ID , A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID , A.BATCH_OPERT_ID , A.PARAMTR , A.STTUS , A.ERROR_INFO , A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM , A.EXECUT_END_TM , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID FROM ( SELECT BATCH_RESULT_ID , BATCH_SCHDUL_ID , BATCH_OPERT_ID , PARAMTR , STTUS , ERROR_INFO , EXECUT_BEGIN_TM , EXECUT_END_TM , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTNBATCHRESULT WHERE 1=1
BATCH_RESULT_ID = #searchKeyword#
BATCH_SCHDUL_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY BATCH_RESULT_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNBATCHRESULT WHERE 1=1
BATCH_RESULT_ID = #searchKeyword#
BATCH_SCHDUL_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
